title: What are the 5 all-time best lyrics for rock songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are my favorites,in no particular order: 1)Time:pink Floyd"And you run and you run To catch up with the sunBut its sinking..Racing around,to come up behind u AGAIN...The sun is the same,in a relative way,but you're olderShorter of breath,one day,closer to DEATH.." 2)Layla:Eric Clapton"Let's make the best of the situation Before I finally go insane!Plz don't say,you'll never find your way..Tell me all my Love's in vain.." 3)Hotel California:EaglesNow,this one has the most absorbing lyrics,and most of the listeners don't get the hidden meaning behind the words."Mirrors on the ceiling..pink chpaigne on iceAnd she said:we're all just prisoners here,of our own device""Last thing I remember,I wasRunning for the door-I had to find my passage back,To the place I was before.'Relax',said the nightman'We're programmed to receive-You can check out any time you like..But you can never leave!!"So guys,on reading such wordings,the first impression anybody would get is hotel California is a hotel with Satan worshippings..But read carefully,listen carefully,the song speaks about DRUG ADDICTION,and once you enter this world of drugs,you can never leave..!!Great job! 4)Sweet child of mine:Guns n Roses 5)Wish you were here:Pink Floyd And some more to try on:Comfortaby numb:pink Floyd, No woman no cry:Bob Marley,hey jude :Beatles,In the end:LP,Smells like teen spirit:Nirvana.

For me the best 5 songs when it comes to lyrics are    It's Probably Me lyrics by Sting or Eric Clapton and that song is used as original sound track for Leathal weapon 3Coming back to Life: I like this lyrics a lot and at times when I feel very depressed I listen to this song and feel betterI want to break free/ Bohemian Rhapsody: I like the lyrics of I want to break free by Queen. I like Bohemian Rhapsody lyrics as well and I am actually confused which I like the mostCats in the Cradle: This lyrics I have a very good meaning about the relation of a parent and son and I really love to listen to itSultans of Swing: Dire Straits Sultans of Swing is awesome lyrics and just portrays how a band is struggling to make an impactI like a few more like Metallica " One", Bon Jovi "Always", Lionell Richie "Hello" , Guns N Roses "Paradise City"  and a few more. But the top 5 are probably those
